name: @coasys/ad4m-integration-tests
description: Node.js package that allows the running/interfacing of AD4M Languages & Perspectives.

scripts.test-main: node scripts/cleanTestingData.js && pnpm run prepare-test && pnpm run test-all && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test:windows: pnpm run prepare-test:windows && pnpm run test-all:windows && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test-all:windows: node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-simple && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-app && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-auth && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-integration && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-prolog-and-literals
scripts.test-all: node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-simple && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-app && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-auth && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-integration && node scripts/cleanup.js && pnpm run test-prolog-and-literals && node scripts/cleanup.js
scripts.prepare-test:macos: ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && deno run --allow-all scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && pnpm run inject-language-language && pnpm run publish-test-languages && pnpm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test:linux: ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && deno run --allow-all scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && pnpm run inject-language-language && pnpm run publish-test-languages && pnpm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test:windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/build-test-language.ps1 && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.ps1 && deno run --allow-all scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && pnpm run inject-language-language && pnpm run publish-test-languages && pnpm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.test-single-prepare: node scripts/cleanTestingData.js && pnpm run prepare-test && node scripts/cleanup.js
